vulnerabilities.title: Improper exception handling in Aedes
vulnerabilities.description: An issue was discovered in MoscaJS Aedes 0.42.0 and fixed in 0.42.1. lib/write.js does not properly consider exceptions during the writing of an invalid packet to a stream.

vulnerabilities.title: Incorrect Authorization
vulnerabilities.description: Versions of aedes before 0.35.1 does not respect its own authorization rules when a client sets a Last Will.
